  • Method Details

    • distanceBetween

      public static double distanceBetween(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
      Compute the (Euclidean) distance between two points.
      Parameters:
      x1 - x-coordinate of a point
      y1 - y-coordinate of a point
      x2 - x-coordinate of another point
      y2 - y-coordinate of another point
      Returns:
      the Euclidean distance between (x1,y1) and (x2,y2)

    • drawBullsEye

      public static void drawBullsEye(double x, double y, double radius)
      Draw a bull's eye at the given location with the given radius.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate of the center of the bull's eye
      y - the y coordinate of the center of the bull's eye
      radius - the radius of the bull's eye

    • substituteAll

      public static String substituteAll(String source, char target, String replacement)
      Return a new String which is the original source String with all occurrences of the target character substituted by the replacement String.
      Parameters:
      source - the source String
      target - the target character to be replaced
      replacement - the replacement String
      Returns:
      the String which results from substituting all of the target characters in the source String with the replacement String

    • arraySum

      public static int arraySum(int[] values)
      Compute the sum of elements in an array
      Parameters:
      values - an array of integers
      Returns:
      the sum of the elements in values

    • filledArray

      public static int[] filledArray(int length, int value)
      Return an array of a given size filled with the provided value
      Parameters:
      length - the length of the returned array
      value - the value to fill the array with
      Returns:
      and array of size that's filled with value

    • arrayMean

      public static double arrayMean(int[] values)
      Return the mean of an array
      Parameters:
      values - the array
      Returns:
      the mean of the array as a double
